snippet: A mother acquires much-needed furnishings with the help of the Neediest Cases Fund.
abstract: Editorial invites readers to donate to the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund; program supports agencies like the Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, which helped single mother Krystle Jackson buy furniture.
lead_paragraph: A mother acquires much-needed furnishings with the help of the Neediest Cases Fund.

headline.print_headline: Creating a Cozy Home for Her Children
headline.main: Creating a Cozy Home for Her Children
